summary: A collection of generic utility components used throughout the system, including ordered enumeration support, an ordered set data structure, a throttling decorator, and assorted helpers for string sanitization, slug creation, random identifier generation, and local network information retrieval.
business_intent: Provide reusable, lightweight building blocks that simplify common programming tasks across the platform, ensuring consistent handling of ordered data, rateâ€‘limited operations, and safe string manipulation while supporting core functionality such as device discovery and configuration handling.
